other_tests.date: Day 28, about 3 weeks off steroids and antihistamines
other_tests.findings: Bottled camel milk produced 8-mm induration and 30-mm erythema; cow milk protein reagent produced no reactions.
Contains puriﬁed protein administered by the Mantoux method; the diameter of the indurated area was measured at 72 h.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Tuberculin skin test reactivity negatively correlates with atopic dermatitis/allergic rhinitis but not asthma.

other_tests.findings: Puriﬁed Candida albicans antigen was administered and the diameter of the indurated area was measured at 72 h.
